title: Danish porcelain
creator_credit: Dansk Kulturfilm and Gunnar Robert Hansen
brief_description: After tracing the history of porcelain from ancient China, shows all stages of production in the Royal Danish Porcelain Factory, and in the Bing and Grondahl Factory. Shows specimens of modern Danish ceramic art.
description: After tracing the history of porcelain from ancient China, shows all stages of production in the Royal Danish Porcelain Factory, and in the Bing and Grondahl Factory. Shows specimens of modern Danish ceramic art.
